attributes.action: Start online classes for schools and colleges
attributes.additional_details:
Start online classes for schools and colleges due to the increase in COVID-19 cases. This will insure that students across England will be getting the vital education they  are entitled to, and  will help in  stopping the spread of COVID-19. We have seen cases rise with schools and colleges staying open. Online classes for all students across England will:

1. Insure that no child will be missing out on vital education 
2. Help in stopping the spread of Covid-19 
3. Save the NHS
4. Most of all SAVE LIVES
attributes.background: Start teaching online. We have seen that this has already been done with universites

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require schools to adopt a part-time attendance rota while Covid-19 is a threat: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551615

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
